11.content: Alright, let's get some more choices out of the way first! What race should the OC be?
11.title: Fantasy OCs

111.content:
Name: Viper

Age: 16

Bio: Viper is a dragonboy with shoulder length red hair and pointed teeth. He appears human apart from the scarlet wings sticking out of his back and the spiny tail poking out above his rear. His eyes are yellow with slit pupils and he wears torn pants and a blue sleeveless shirt. He has a toned build and a cocky, arrogant attitude.

On his feet are a pair of boots that make his large thick feet notoriously smelly.

Viper is a young dragonboy who is as one would expect, quite enormous in size...even when in his human form. Needless to say he loves using his size to terrorize and torment the helpless citizens of the kingdom...kidnap a few knights to make a meal out of...you know the usual dragon antics.
111.title: Viper the Dragonboy

choices: Play with his food a bit
1111.content:
The Kingdom of Wyle was a small one, formed in the disputed lands of two neighboring kingdoms. Their remarkable landmarks included the Lake of Tears and the large Mountains of Ofn.

The mountains were a forbidden place to trek. This was due to the danger known as Viper the dragonboy. Knights would be abducted and their city would be attacked by the giant boy, traveling up the mountains would both lead to a quick death and a unwanted visit from Viper.

Speaking of, at the top of the mountains a loud echoed rang out. It was a distinctive sound, similar to that of a satisfied belch from a meal.

Lying against a large rock hill, Viper patted his abs as steam flowed out from his maw. The red haired boy whistle as he picked his teeth with a tiny sword.

"Whoa you put up quite the fight little guy! Most of my snacks give up and get digested, but I feel ya squirming."

Viper put his hands behind his head, he smirked as he caught whiffs of his hot b.o flowing off his pits.

"Quite the visit if I say so myself. Got to crush up some runts and see what knights old kingy hired now."

The dragon boy closed his eyes and hummed as he started slithering his tail. Soon the end lifted before him, coiled in the scaly appendage was a knight. The tiny groaned as he was squeezed and looked in fear at the yellow slits opening to peer at him.

"And here is our finale course of the meal! Your buddies were tasty so I'm just itching to have some dessert!", Vipers sharp teeth grinned as he started bringing the knight closer.

Viper suddenly clutches his stomach and groaned. "Eh damn...the runt's fighting!"

The knight was brought away from the dragonboy's face as he contorted his face, smoke started pouring from his lips. Viper suddenly opened his mouth and let out a earth shaking belch

BUURRGGGHHHHHPP!

With the loud belch came a stream of fire blasting out. The tiny looked up in shock as the massive wave of flames passed over. He could feel the waves of heat hitting, making the scaly skin heat up more.

Viper sighed relived and patted his firm stomach. "Damn runt, it's been awhile since I belched with my fire! Hope your warm in there ", the giant smirked as he brought the final tiny back up.

What does Viper plan to do?
1111.title: Viper The Dragonboy

choices: Viper visits the nearby village on this HOT day!
Viper Takes a Nap...Perhaps Sneaky Assassins Arrive?
11111.content:
Licking his lips and flashing his fangs, Viper opened his enormous maw and stuck his tongue out. The knight was unable to squirm free as the tail coiled around him was quite strong.

The tongue extended like a slimy red carpet underneath the knight. Then the tail uncoiled and he landed on it with a moist plop!

The tongue zipped back into the cavern, the sharp teeth passed overhead and underneath the quivering knight like cave formations themselves. With a sound like a drawbridge clanking shut, the teeth chomped down together...leaving Viper's victim in darkness.

Hot, wet, sticky and slimy darkness was all the knight knew. Then, the tongue began slapping him around the jaws.

"Mmm...you're even tastier than your buddies! I'm almost tempted to bite you in half!" Viper darkly chuckled, hearing the puny screams of the knight in his mouth.

Viper took his time cruelly tormenting the now hysterical knight in his mouth. Tasting him, teasingly swallowing spit that built up..keeping the runt guessing as to when his time would come.

Finally, Viper decided it was time. "I've enjoyed messing with you and tasting you my little morsel..but your doom has arrived! Enjoy being digested in the scalding hot depths of my belly!" Viper boomed with laughter before swallowing mightily.

The knight squirmed and screamed as he was washed down with sticky spit...travelling down Viper's gullet.

Viper moaned...content in the knowledge he'd devoured another foolish knight.
11111.title: Finish his meal

choices: Viper chuckles, turns out he wasn't asleep!
111112.content:
Viper felt his stomach make gurgle noises, he smirked as he felt his meal being disgusted and converted to fuel for his body.

"I should visit the king someday, give my compliments for the meal.", the dragon boy suddenly opened his mouth as he yawned. "Yawn~ ah nothing like some tasty humans to get me sleepy. It'll take some time before the fools recruit more knights, so I'll just kick back."

Viper stretched his toned body and large wings. The boy rubbed his stomach one last time before putting his arms behind his head and closing his eyes. The giant hummed as he once again caught the musk of his pits.

The Mountains of Ofn now had the echos of Viper's loud snores ringing out. The kingdom below could hear the boy's confirmation of sleep, and while many citizens were relieved at their moment of peace others had plans.

Currently trekking up was a group of five called the Umrica, a organization of assassins for hire. They were settled in numerous kingdoms and had heard of the issue Wyle faced.

They weren't prepared though as they reached the top and were greeted by two giant boot soles crossed at the ankles. Viper was far larger then expected, looking bigger then any castle. The sleeping boy with a drop of drool hanging from his mouth made them wonder if this was actually the ferocious beast.

However, this was confirmed as they saw the numerous suits of armor. Some were melted while others had traces of blood and installed fear in the Assassins. Their leader cleared his throat as he pointed at Viper's sleeping face.

"Alright listen, we'll climb the body and use the wire to cut his throat."

One assassin looked terrified at the plan. "B-but sir won't he feel us climbing? Surely we wil-"

"Quit your yapping fool! You may offer yourself to the beast now for your cowardice.", the leader growled as he lectured his subordinate. "Now then, let's finish this."

The assassins soon split to go to each side of Viper. As they entered the shadow under his toned arms they were hit with the greasy b.o of the giant. There was visible steam coming out of the hot pits, formed from the sweat trailing down the humid pit.

It was hard to ignore the stench as they started climbing the torn shirt. They got closer to the pits and could the clothing dampened from the sweat.

One Assassin lost his grip and fell with a yell, he desperately grabbed onto a greasy pit hair to stop his fall. Good news he wasn't falling, bad news he was swung right into the sweaty and squishy armpit.

Viper grumbled in his sleep, but luckily didn't wake up. The tiny found himself struggling as the other red hairs were matted to the pit so he couldn't climb them.

Soon....
111112.title: Sneaking On The Slumbering

choices: The Leader and Coward Make an Escape!
The Point of View of The Pit Prisoners...
1111122.content:
A smile slowly formed on the giant's face and a deep rumbling chuckle rattled the Umrica to the core. "He's awake!" The tiny glued to his pit screamed, the arms lowered to his sides as the assassins began to panic and break formation.

"Awake? Nah, I was faking the whole time! Stupid runts!" Viper cackled as his toned arms squeezed the assassins into his reeking underarms.

The leader of the assassin group, being the most skilled, managed to escape with none other than the 'cowardly' man from earlier. They utilized grappling hooks to swing themselves out of the oncoming pit squeeze.

"B-but how!? How did he know-?!" The coward hysterically wailed as the duo crouched on a ledge.

"Pfft! One of your scouts told me, duh!" Viper sneered as he stood up to his full, monumental height. "No! You lie, beast!" The leader yelled fiercely. Viper smirked toothily, "Nope, he was pretty tasty....his fear and squirming was awesome as he slid down my throat. He kept begging me to spare him and even offered up the info of his own free will..you'd be surprised how people'll change when confronted with a big badass dragon!" Viper laughed cruelly.

The leader grit his teeth, clenching his fist in anger. This monster...he HAD to be stopped! Meanwhile, the now hysterical and fetal position wimp of an assassin next to him was seeing his life flashing before his eyes.

Viper ground his arms against his sides, enjoying the squelching noises that came from them...and the squirming of his victims. "Mmmm...these losers squirming feels GREAT against my mighty armpits!" Viper exaggeratedly moaned...getting inside the leader and his wimpy comrade's head.
1111122.title: Viper's Dragony Tricks

choices: Viper starts messing with the captain
Viper opens his pits to have fun
11111222.content:
The trapped assassins yelled in terror, only to cough as a splash of greasy sweat dropped in their mouth. Any panicked yells were muffled as Viper pressed his toned arms to his body.

Viper's armpits were like a humid cavern. Dragons naturally had very warm bodies, this showed as the warm squishy walls enveloped the tinies and felt as If a hot blanket was covering them.

The musky b.o was being shoved in their faces, the scent was ripe and had already started marinating the tinies in the odor. Such a powerful stench made their throat burn from the sweaty fumes and sour musk.

They could hear Viper taunting their leader and teammate, it was however muffled and made more difficult to hear as the squishes and squelched surrounded them. Tiny bodies were smooshed as Viper rubbed his arms back and forth suppressing any attempts at escape.

"Hey what the rush? How about you enjoy this dragon's gift. I don't like my company to be cold after all!", Viper smirked as he flex hard so that his arms pressed extra hard.

The toned muscles squished the bodies into the mushy pit flesh. The greasy sweat was now covering all on the body squashed into the rank pit.

"Damn your friends feel real good! It usually takes a lot for nerds like you to please my body", Viper licked his lips and smirked at the two escapees.

The dragon ground his pits again, moaning as he heard the long satisfying squish.

Soon........
11111222.title: A Pitiful Situation

111112221.content:
The captain grit his teeth and was about to unsheathe his blade...but neither him nor the wimp saw the tail being creeped up behind them.

Viper grinned that toothy grin of his as his tail coiled around the duo tightly. The men's arms were squeezed to their sides and they were brought before the enormous smirking mug. "Well, look what we have here...a couple 'a bugs sent to take on a badass DRAGON." Viper's foul breath washed over them, they didn't call it 'dragon breath' for nothing it seems.

"Release me, foul beast!" The captain yelled.

"A-and me too!" The wimpy assassin whined. Viper chuckled darkly and sat back down with a quake that caused chunks of the mountainside to come loose. "Naaaah, I don't think so...but I'll tell ya what I WILL do..." Viper grinned deviously and hoisted his right muscular arm behind his neck.

Immediately, the steamy and visibly greasy armpit was unleashed...and the hot stank flowed forth. The captain and wimp squirmed uncomfortably as the tail was brought closer to the pit.

"I'll let you guys just admire this sexy pit of mine...and breaathe in that hot funk." Viper purred.
111112221.title: Captain of the Bugs

choices: The coward quickly takes a lick
Theres no licks...time to press the bugs in!
1111122211.content:
The hot musk was hitting the two like a warm wind, it was just a part of Viper's mighty body. With any attempt to struggle out of the hold, Viper squeezed them more with his constricting tail.

"So if I guessing....your pests were weren't just visiting me to say hello?", Viper put his chin on his knuckle as he asked the question. "If anything a lot of humans try to get as far as they can from this awesome drake!"

The captain coughed as the scaly skin squeezed him and he inhaled the greasy b.o from the pit. "R-release us monst-ACK!"

Viper chuckled as he tightened his tail. "It seems you aren't appreciating my musk, let's get you losers a closer look."

The duo were soon covered in the shadow of Viper's toned arm and felt the air thicken and become hotter. The sour warm musk clouded around them and also put in a tinge of salt from the sweat.

"C..apt..ain... "

The assassin smooshed into the sweaty skin weakly called out to his leader. The past few minutes had been rough as he was force to breath in the b.o while being smooshed by the flesh.

"Hehe cheer up little guy you've got your tiny friends with you!", Viper mockingly called out.

Suddenly the tail started to ho closer to the pit wall, Viper smirked stopped a inch away from pressing the duo to his pit.

"Now I'm willing to bargain so listen up. You pests stick out your tongues and take a nice lick, if you do I won't pulverize you into my hot musk like your pal!"

The duo were put in disgust by this deal, seeing one of their comrades hardly consious and breathing in this faul air seem to influence the coward.

However, the captain held too much pride. "ERGH we would never do something so faul you beast!"

Viper frowned at this before suddenly squeezing his tail again. Both assassins cried out as their ribs felt close to breaking.

"If you losers wanna be so arrogant like the rest of the bugs then fine. But, I'll give you ten seconds to give in or get turned into gunk under my pit!"

The dragonboy's arm rose higher to signal its inevitable fall, Viper started counting down from ten.

Soon....
1111122211.title: A Musky Bargain

choices: By chance, a fellow dragonboy has caught a whiff of Viper!
11111222111.content:
Almost without thinking, the coward leaned forward as much as he could...and gave a nice long lick up the greasy armpit. The captain looked horrified with disgust as the coward smacked his lips and cringed...they heard a deep moan of satisfaction and Viper's eyes locked on to the coward.

"Now...THAT felt good....you get to go and tell what you've seen here today...and TASTED." Viper laughed at his joke before loosening the tail so the coward fell onto his butt.

"I-I'm sorry, captain!" The coward wailed as he made a beeline down the mountain path...and vanished out of sight. The captain was fuming...but felt fear starting to creep in as he felt Viper's gaze on him.

"Sucks to be you...you've got a LOT of pit to meet!" Viper sniggered before using his tail to gingerly moosh the captain into his sensitive stank flesh.

The bug's squirming felt exquisite, this feeling NEVER got old to the dragon. "Mmmmh...I love it when a bug hasn't been broken and thinks he can wiggle away..." The dragon shivered in delight.

"MMFMMFMFGH!" The captain's muffled curses tickled the giant male's flesh. "Yeaah...keep talkin'...having a long conversation with my pit, huh?" Viper snarked.

Lifting his other arm and relaxing both arms behind his head, Viper sighed as he aired out the raunchy areas. "I wonder if nearby villages can smell me...heh..." Viper snickered.
11111222111.title: A Cowardly Lick

choices: Viper showed of his pit's captives!
The two took a friendly stroll....through the kingdom!
111112221111.content:
NEW CHALLENGER APPROACHING!

Name: Shimo

Age: 16

Appreance: Shimo has a athletic body much like Viper, his wings and tail however are a dark blue. He wears a long sleeve blue shirt and purple trousers, keeping his large feet in a pair of brown sandals. He has shorter length black hair tied in a low ponytail, the fringe usually covers his left eye. He also has sharp teeth.

Bio: This dragonboy comes from the country of Peima. He like other dragons enjoys terriozing humans and relishes in stamping out the puny creatures. Shimo met Viper as a hatchling and holds a friendly yet competitive relationship.

_________________________________

Shimo had been flying in his large blue dragon form when a scent caught his powerful nose.

"That scent....ah so you've settled here old friend~"

The dragon suddenly glowed and morphed into that of a humanoid shape. A purple slit eye narrowed at a set of mountains below.

"I suppose giving Viper and his pest a visit will be enjoyable.", smiling slightly Shimo started floating down. He soon landed on the rocky earth, shaking it beneath his sandals.

Viper opened a eye as he felt a shake. He hummed as he twitched his nose and amidst his musky odor he sensed a new yet familiar one. The dragon boy grinned widely as he got up and dropped his pits, not listening to the panicked yells being smooshed.

"SHIMO!", The booming voice echoed as Viper saw across his mountains stood his old friend with his arms crossed and waving his blue tail.

Shimo opened his eye. "Ah Viper, long time no see!"

The red dragon began running over, making the ground shake and humans fear if the mountain was about have a avalanche of rocks. The scene seemed to go in slow motion with Viper running with a happy grin and Shimo standing still while smiling.

And then Viper tackled Shimo to the ground.

"Hah got you this time!", Viper smirked as he pinned the blue dragon to the ground.

Shimo chuckled before he wrapped his legs around Viper and flipped him over. The red dragon grunted as his hands were grapped. The blue dragon had a impish grin.

"Yes...but you kept your guard down~"

Viper huffed as he pushed his friend off. He soon grinned as he sat across from Shimo. "So what's got you visiting, I thought you were traveling the globe?"

"I was, but a friend's familiar musk hit my snout.", the black haired giant coyly grinned.

Viper smirked and flexed. "You know it, I've got the mightiest stench of the Drake's!"

Shimo chuckled and pulled up his shirt to reveal his abs, soon a b.o stench came off as well.

"Yes but let's not forget me~"

Soon.....
111112221111.title: A New And Familiar Dragon

114.content:
https://www.deviantart.com/trumfire/art/... Inspired by this character!!

---------------------------------------

Name: Logan

Age: 19

Gender: Male

Appearance: Logan has a lean muscular build that any girl (or man) would die for. His hair is shaggy but neatly kept, as prince of Avalere he wore a red (his favorite color) outfit and black boots. But currently he wears collared shirts and jeans for the most part...just because he's displaced in another and more technologically advanced realm doesn't mean he'll dress like a commoner or a bum! On his feet he wears a pair of slip on shoes and black socks.

History: Prince Logan was/is the crown prince of a wealthy royal family in a magical realm called Avalere. He was a bit of a brat and to call him cruel and snobbish would be an understatement. Logan relished in his authority and looked down his nose as the peasants and lesser classes.

So when he was suddenly 'zapped' to another dimension...nobody really mourned the loss...even his parents the King and Queen! After all, his younger brother was much nicer and sweeter. He'd make a far better king.

Logan suddenly found himself forced to adapt to a strange land with technology and the most horrifying of all...he'd have to get a JOB!

Still, Logan wasn't without his advantages. He possessed a magic that allowed him to shrink others for his enjoyment. It would come quite in handy at 'persuading' some of these weirdo people! Or just having fun when he was bored or stressed by this turn of events.
114.title: The Teen Prince

1141.content:
Logan woke up to quite the racket, cracking open his eyes, his vision focused as he realized he wasn't in his bed...not even his bedroom! "What the hell?" Logan stood up and saw he was in some grimy alleyway with a snoring bum. Sneering at the unkempt commoner, he stomped out onto the sidewalk shouting: "WHAT THE HELL IS GOING ON?!"

That got quite a few stares, but nobody was as shocked as the young prince himself. What was this place? There were buildings that towered into the sky made of some unknown metal...taller than even his palace!

There were dozens of people walking around talking into strange rectangles they held to their cheeks...or tapping at them in their hands. There were loud honking noises and strange 'horseless carriages' carrying people down the streets.

It was all quite an overload for the 19 year old who hailed from a far less crowded and noisy and technologically advanced place.

Clamping his hands over his ears, he quickly rushed down the sidewalk..only to bump into someone. "Oof! Watch where you're going!! Damn cosplayers..." The man grumbled in reference to Logan's strange attire.

Logan scowled, he wouldn't be talked to like that by ANYONE...but he needed information. The man hmphed and wandered up to a apartment nearby...unaware Logan was following him.

The man had disrespected Logan, and he had chosen him as his source of information. When the man opened the front door, Logan made sure no one was looking, and shrank him on his doorstep.

The poor individual looked around in confusion as a shadow engulfed him and he was brought to that cosplay brat's enormous face! Immediately, he began to scream..unable to understand what had happened.

Logan sneered, "Listen up, peasant! Is anyone else here?"

The man whimpered but didn't answer...Logan tightened his grip around him. "I asked you a question!"

"M-My son...." The man answered. Logan's eyes flashed with cruel joy, "Excellent, I'll have leverage over you then."

Logan wandered inside and shut the front door behind him. A young teen looked up from the couch and his eyes widened, "Who the hell are y-" He never completed that sentence, as Logan shrank him too.

Plucking the confused youth up into his hands, Logan sat down on the couch..now with his two prisoners in his fists.

"I've got some questions for you specks! If you refuse to answer...I'll kill the one across from you." Logan brought the duo up to his narrowed eyes, "And I'll make the other one watch."

Placing them both on the coffee table in front of the couch, Logan unbuttoned his jacket and tossed it aside..leaving him in a pitstained white dress shirt...which he peeled away to reveal his slim muscled torso.
1141.title: The Displaced Prince: Logan!

choices: Logan puts the son in his other pit!
11411.content:
Logan's muscled torso glistened as drops of sweat rolled down his pecs and abs. It was kinda warm and the prince was know to produce the salty liquid normally.

The two shrunken victims watched in terror and awe as the looming giant smirked down at them and flexed a bicep cockily.

"If you insects are done checking me out then we can get started on my answers. Luckily I've got a few of my many personal interrogators to squeeze the answers out."

Reaching down, Logan plucked the father up getting a panicked yell and terrified look from the son. The prince licked his lips as he stretched his muscular arm over his head.

A large steamy landscape filled with sour musky odor was pouring out. Various brunette hairs were greasy and pasted to the squishy skin.

Logan chuckled as he began bringing the tiny to his pit. "Ok runt, tell me now where am i?"

"P-please let me go!"

The prince scoffed. "I didn't ask you for pathetic squeaks, now let me show you what my interrogators think of bugs!"

The tiny squirmed as he was quickly brought closer into the powerful musky odor of the pit. Logan pressed him into the squishy skin, the oniony steam was shoved onto him and up his nostrils. Logan hummed as he pressed the bug into his greasy pit.

Logan looked to the teen looking up terrified as his father was squished in the prince's pit. The giant smirked as he lowered his arm and pressed his arms to his body to trap the father into the musk. Crossing his arms, Logan murred from the feeling of the tiny trapped body.

"Better hope your old man speaks up brat. If he keeps yapping like a bug then I'm sure a runt like you will keep him good company!"

Soon...
11411.title: Armpit Interrogation Technique!

1142.content:
Inspired by this character from Guilty Gear, https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/guil... )
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Sin

Age:18

History: There is a far and mystical place called the Kingdom of Light, a civilization of individuals wishing to protect the world from evil monsters that aim to snuff out the light.

Sin and Sed were a pair of brothers born to knights belonging to the holy order, a elite guard of knights who defend the kingdom. A curse had been put on them while their mother was carrying Sed, thankfully they weren't harmed but Sed was given the full blunt of the curse. Being shrunken down to an inch.

The family was still close and Sin vowed to be the best big brother ever to help his tiny sibling. This turned into a world crushing burden as they parents died on a quest to fight a dark beast.

Now 18, Sin has become a knight like his parents to honor them. Sed couldn't become a knight, but he didn't intend to get left in the dust! He became skilled in magic and even was appointed a mage position at 15.

Sin is a cheerful and outgoing guy with a tendency to get cocky, not to mention being slightly overprotective of Sed. Being the literal BIG brother had Sin often finding his brother beneath him, not that Sed cared too much usually just getting annoyed at how often he got squished.

Still, the 18 and 15 year old held a strong family bond and Sin would show his fury should his brother ever face cruelty.
1142.title: Sin The Knight and Big Brother

11421.content:
Inside the main castle of the kingdom were the quarters of the Holy Order, many of the knights live here as they were similar to the S brothers in that they have no home due to tragedies. It was a like a new home for the knights to build and grow from in comradeship.

In one room Sed was on the landscape of a bed reading notes from his magic class. He had mastered fire and ice magic, but was still having issues with telepathy and sealing spells. The younger blond sighed as he concentrated but failed to conjure up any light energy.

"Why can't i do it!", Sed felt downtrodden at his failure to perform. "Sin's so far in his training, if i don't catch up...what if he..."

Despite the brotherly bond, Sed often had insecurities thinking he was holding Sin back. Magic was his strong suit due his size so he needed to be top in it. Shaking his head, Sed jogged over to the side of the bed making a ring of wind around him and floating down to the floor.

The ground soon had light shaking as a presence outside the door. Sed smiled as he walked up to the door, sure enough it swung open and revealed his towering brother in his tall white and blue outfit.

Sin smiled as he walked in. "Sed I'm back!", walking in the older brother shook the floor beneath his large brown shoes. Sed tumbled from the force of his brother's steps.

"Welcome back Sin!", however it seemed the older brother didn't here him as he didn't look down. Sed groaned as he knew what was coming. "Oh brother."

With his next step, Sin's heeled sole hung over before stomping down making Sed vanish beneath it. The tiny brother was somewhat lucky as instead of getting smushed to the flat sole he got trapped between the treads of the shoe.

Sin took a seat at the desk in the room, putting his hands behind his head and throwing his large feet up. The sweaty smell of his lit leaked out as they stained his white top, and his body overall had a b.o ting from his training.

Looking over at the bed, Sin grinned as he saw the notes. "He must've been studying i swear he does that more than sleep.", the older brother hummed as he waited for his brother to come out.

Meanwhile, Sed sighed as he felt cramped in the dread of his brother's footwear. After wiggling a bit, Sed managed to pop out using his wind to slow down his fall. He now stood before the heel that was bigger than him and looming above were the giant stompers crossed at the ankles.

Sed sighed as he walked around and saw the long way to his brother humming with his eyes closed.

The tiny brother decided to....
11421.title: Sin and Sed

When the ship decend Oliver was able to see the planet and it is...
12121.title: Oliver Watson

121211.content:
The ship began to descend and Oliver began to notice that the planet was very earth like. "This planet must be inhabitant by a large variety of animals or plants" stated Oliver as he stands by the main deck standing infront of the door. "Landing near the nearest life force" spoke the AI as the ship began the landing sequence.

Not too far from where Oliver's ship is landing lies a civilization so tiny that its unseen by most beings. Within the city rumors of a bright light followed by a spaceship. Many people were called out as being liars and some were believers of a newer species. But that all changed the moment the ground began to shake violently. "Oh god it's an earthquake" shouted one of the citizens within a small shop as everything began falling off the counter and shelves. The earthquake got stronger and stronger as the citizens began to panic in fear. Just then a large shadow casts upon the tiny village. As every citizen looks up at the massive being causing the shadow and once they did most of them panicked and ran for their lives and others were amazed and in awe. Just then the massive being spoke and to the citizens the voice was loud as if it belonged to a god.

"The air here smells wonderful, it's beautiful here" spoke Oliver unknown of the very tiny city right infront of his black leather shoes. "Oh what's that" wondered Oliver as he crotches. The tiny citizens saw Oliver's hand getting closer and closer to them. The hand itself is so big that at a whole city will could fit and still look like a tiny coin.

But what is Oliver reaching for?

1311.content:
That day Jeffery had been staying over his uncle's house for the weekend for a party of some sort. For Jeffery he wasnt into socializing with most people to the fact he would rather be alone and do his own thing. Throughout the day he had come to realize that the so called party was just trick his uncle planned just to get Jeffery out of his comfort shell and have fun.

Due to Jeffery's uncle knowing that his nephew is sexually attracted to men. He has decided to invite over his co-workers and friends in a chance to get one of them to go out with his nephew or at least become friends with.

But as usual Jeffery has stood in his room for the majority of the night to avoid socializing with anyone. But that all changed when the lights in Jeffery room began to shut off. "What the?" Stated as he is now left in the pitch darkness of his room. Before saying anything else a small blue light has found it's way into the room as it goes towards Jeffery. "What is that" spoke Jeffery as he reaches out to touch it and the moment he touched the light he had instantly passed out.

Within a couple hours he has awaken from the slumber and began looking around seeing nothing but a white landscape. "Where am I" he asked. As Jeffery wonders around a massive shadow engulfs him. When he looked up he noticed that enormous figure of his best friend standing over him. "Oh my gosh" spoke Jeffery as he stumbles backward looking up at his best friend as if he was a monster right out of a horror movie. "He's gigantic.... Wait no....." Jeffery thought. "Oh crud I have been shrunken" gasped Jeffery as he looks up at the gigantic figure

"Jeffery where are you, I was wondering if I can borrow a towel to dry myself off with."
Spoke the titantic good as he rests a hand on his hip and the other by his head scratching it softly wondering where his buddy went and where the towels are.

Jeffery looked up at the wet muscular body of his best friend at first he never pay attention to him in this sort of way but due to being shrunk to the size of a mere ant it sorta caused a new found affection for him towards his best friend. "Cameron's .... So... Hot" mumbled Jeffery as he stares at the bulging pecs that shines due to the fact that Cameron has recently came out of the pool.

1321.content:
"Are ya done with that stupid thing yet? When do we get our passing grade?" Nate demanded as he leaned back in his chair. This was Sunday and he was stuck at school! The damn nerd Kenneth, who was usually the type Nate would beat up or stuff in a locker, was his only hope in getting a passing grade in Chemistry.

Kenneth pushed up his glasses and sighed, "I told you it's going to be ready tomorrow, we're almost done."

"You givin' me lip, nerd?" Nate narrowed his eyes menacingly. "N-no...not at all!" Kenneth backpedaled.

Nate smirked, "Good. Now hurry it up!" The bully and notorious delinquent was wearing a sleeveless red shirt, a pair of cargo shorts and blue flip-flops.

Nate had been skipping showers lately, and he currently had his wide, meaty feet propped up on the table. His first toe crevice which was wrapped around the thongs of the flip-flops, squelched and practically oozed a gross jammy substance around the shoe.

The bad boy had made a habit of inching his feet close to his nerd partner's face, just to see his face show that grossed out look and provide him with some amusement.

With a final swirl of the beaker, Kenneth believed he had finally perfected his 'plant growth' serum they would be presenting tomorrow. "There! Now all that's left is to test it!" Kenneth said as he presented the transparent green liquid to Nate.

Nate finally stood up and walked over, he raised an eyebrow. "It just looks like Mountain Dew...smells like it too! Are you ripping me off?!" Nate demanded with a clenched fist.

Kenneth paled, "N-No!"

"I'm gonna drink some of it just to make sure you're not fucking with me!" Nate snarled.

"W-what?! You can't do that! We don't know what will happ-" Kenneth started to protest, only for Nate to shove him down onto the floor. "You don't tell me what to do, ya loser!" Nate proceeded to bring the beaker up to his lips and begin chugging the liquid.

In an instant, half of the stuff was gone! Wiping his mouth on his arm, Nate smacked his lips. "I was right! It was Mountan Dew! You're gonna get it n-UUUUUUURRRRRRRRRRRRRP!" Nathan suddenly let out an ear splitting belch, the loud rumble shook the windows...it was unnaturally loud and deep.

But what's more, Nathan was growing as the belch continued!

How big does he get..?

141.title: Alien Invasion!

1411.content:
Earth

A beacon of life in the vast, wide universe. For years curiosity plagued the human soul and let to many treks in history. Today that curiosity still eats at us, wondering if there were others out there like them. Beings who lived and thought like them, alien beings.

Little did we know that there were, and they had more then curious intent for earth.

It was a sunny day in New York City, the summer season had arrived and everyone was bustling around. It seems everything as of now was peaceful, no public outcry or fierce hostility to the government.

This all changed as the sky darkened.

From high above a strange shape was made out. It was a dark blue and looked like that of a standing figure to those who use their phone zooms.

Soon as the object descended, everyone was confused as the bottom looked like that of soles to a pair of black shoes. Above were dark blue trousers to a suit. It shocked everyone as this descending clothing turned out to belong to that of a giant humanoid! The figure looked to be male and was floating down

The shoes soon slowly made contact with the ground. The giant was that of a young man, he had icy blue skin and shocking white hair. A pair of black shades rested on his eyes. The giant had his hands in his pockets as he overlooked the city.

A tiny flash had the giant pulling his shades of, revealing golden eyes. Down below, a speck near his show had taken a photo of the suit giant looming above. The giant looked down at the tiny specimen. A devilish smirk grew as he suddenly lifted his foot, filling the tiny's sky with the sole of his dress shoe.

"Heres a better photo for you.", the booming voice called down.

The man couldn't even process the situation as the giant stomped his foot down. A crater was formed from his forceful step, amidst it was a tiny crunch.

The ground had a mighty shake and the crushing action had them suddenly running in the opposite direction of the giant.

The blue giant folded up his shades, putting them in his coat. Lifting up his foot the alien saw a small red splatter mark on his shoe sole. He groaned as he started walking into the city.

"I'm gonna need to clean these puppies after my fun, I just got them."

Everyone was running from the booming steps, nearly tripping with each step the giant took. Numerous abandoned cars were flattened beneath the polished shoes, not to mention all the humans who fell and were reduced to crunches. Their last sight being the giant dress shoe sole.

Barwin chuckled as he smirked. "My your all fast, the last bugs I chased were far slower!", the loud taunting voice boomed throughout the city.

"I said I would bring back a few humans, but this fear is just....delicious.", Barwin licked his lips as he felt his hunger being extinguished.

Soon...
1411.title: Barwin The Cold Alien

It also fills the giant meta-humans with a desire to crumble live beneath them.

He holds a grudge against humanity and waits to flatten them alongside his children.

He soon reunites with his father and joins him in wreaking havoc.
