151.title: Kaiju

1511.content:
The sun was brightly shining with the ocean water glistening from the bright rays. In the middle of the vast body of water, one young lad was taking a nap on a rock slab he called his own. He was lightly snoring as his head rested on his folded arms, laying on his back.

This boy carried many strange qualities, such as strange gills near his neck. His large and steamy looking feet had a grayish color to them and between his toes were web like fins. A truly peculiar boy, even more so as a toy sized boat started riding up a little alongside the rock!

"W-hat the?", a crew mate looked in shock at the giant teen resting on the rock.

The captain of this trash vessal looked at the dark clothed giant with aquatic features. "Damn...its one of those Toumo basterds! The shark kaiju Andy!" The bearded man narrowed his eyes at the gigantic emo boy.

"Quick accelerate the engines get us out of he-!" The navigator of the crew wanted to get as far away Andy as possible, but was cut off as the captain planted a fist on the rail.

"NO! We will staying here and contact the kaiju control. When we're acknowledged as the leading cause in the downfall of this beast think of the fame!", The captain cockily grinned.

The crew mates looked to each other in obvious distress. The navigator cleared his throat as he suddenly saw Andy shift and make a few bolder size 'pebbles' splash into the ocean.

"Captain this isn't the best plan-", the man was cut off as the captain glared at him.

"What's this mutiny?! We are going to capture this freak and that is-?!"

"Oh, I've got some vistors.", a booming voice suddenly called out.

The whole crew looked up as a shadow suddenly covered them. Looming into the sky was Andy looking down at them with a bored look.

"I wasn't expecting you ants to come this far out. Still, I can squeeze in some after a nap.", the sharkboy suddenly smirked as he started reaching for the tiny boat.

The engineer didn't wait for an order and immediately put full power into the boat. The vessal quickly bounced over the waves in a desperate attempt to flee despite the captain's furious shouts.

Andy chuckled as the boat made some distance. He could dive into HIS ocean, but he dis just wake up. Snapping his fingers, Andy started wiggling his webbed toes as he felt the sweat from the hot sun start to trail down his body. Now, just to wait....

The boat suddenly jerked as it was halted, the men were thrown to the deck. Loud sounds of crunching metal were blasting around them and boat continued to rock back and forth. Looking over the side, a deck mate yelled in horror as he saw not one but multiple Great White Sharks biting inti the boat.

The aquatic predators strangely didn't continued tearing into the hull, rather they began pushing the boat back to Andy. The giant teen impishly grinned as he reached down and easily picked the boat up from the water, it almost fit entirely in his palm.

Andy gave a two finger salute to the many sharks gathered below. "Thanks guys.", the aquatic creatures then swam off from their giant friend.

The sharkboy looked at the boat with a mischievous glint in his eyes. "I wasn't planning on crushing you runts intill later, but you straight up offered yourselfs. Guess you humans can't get enough of my salty feet crushin-"

BANG!

The Captain's previous fearless look was now shattered as he pulled out a small pistol and fired at Andy's face. The giant blinked as he felt the faintest taps on his cheeks. After seeing the tiny gun, Andy licked his lips as he suddenly grabbed the squirming captain and set the boat down between his large soles.

The crew members immediately felt tears stinging their eyes as a strong salty stench covered them. It was like a mixture of sea salt and sweaty musk, with a added scent of cheese. They could still see the terrifying sight above.

Andy suddenly opened his mouth to reveal his sharpened teeth. He smirked as he brought the tiny closer. "Before I go on a stomping spree, I think having a snack will help."

The next thing the Captain knew, he was placed on a warm and slimy red surface. The white sharp soon closed and warm darkness consumed him. The tiny soon was sloshed around as Andy slid his tongue and human around his mouth. He then tilted his head back as he felt the squirming lump travel down his throat.

"3,2,1....ah~", Andy sighed and patted his stomach as the human reached the chamber known as his stomach, force to be disgusted into fuel.

The red eyes of the giant narrowed at the ship between his feet. A large smirk was plastered on as Andy began thinking of his fun.

Next.....
1511.title: Toumo Family, A Family Of Giants

152.content:
William Ovelton, you are a genius inventor, highly regarded and winner of several prizes for your work...despite your young age. You are currently working on the breakthrough of a lifetime, your entire life so far has been a build up to this moment!

You have discovered that time travel is indeed possible, but you need to test the device you've built in order to present your findings without widespread mockery. Given that you are a bit of a loner and haven't exactly had time to keep in touch with anybody due to your work...you have no choice but to test it on yourself!

This is where the story begins...in 2019 in a basement laboratory.

========

Will grunted as he calibrated the Time Gate, as he had decided to call it. It was a large energy conductor that resembled something like a Star-Gate. It was a rough design and there were wires showing, but William didn't have the patience to wait any longer!

It was working (he hoped) and ready for some field tests!

Typing in his notes on his laptop, William put his thoughts to a Word document.

I must admit I am equal parts nervous and excited. If this works, I'll be famous and EVERYTHING we thought we knew about time and space will be changed! What was once thought to be the realm of science fiction will be science FACT! If I do not make it back...or worse...this laptop will be stored in a lockbox in my room.

Closing the laptop and taking a quick trip upstairs to store it in the aforementioned place, Will sighed. If he didn't make the return journey within a day, that would mean he would be stuck in the past or future FOREVER.

This was because William was very protective of his work, and had installed a self destruct countdown to begin as soon as he was transported.

That would also mean he sacrificed his only way home...but he was prideful and rather arrogant.

If he couldn't have the glory...then nobody else should.

As he input the date into the keypad, the young scientist had no idea how he would be yanked off his high horse...fate is cruel and ironic sometimes.

Will activated the portal, crackling with energy, and stepped through into the blinding light.

What was the era he chose to visit?

(Note: The trip causes him to shrink! Unfortunate side effect, hehe)
152.title: Time Travel? Time Travel!

1521.content:
Will slowly blinked as he felt the energy of the gate leave him, shifting his feet the young scientist found the ground to strange. Like that of a .....carpet?

Looking down, the scientist found that indeed the floor was like a carpet. The material was like that of a savannah as the the carpet went up to his knees. Behind Will was a tall brown stretching into the sky.

"Wait, this isn't my house..........MY TIME MACHINE WORKED!", Will started dancing happy as he concluded that landing in this unfamiliar territory must mean the gate worked right?!

Looking the other way around, Will's ecstatic face slowly morphed into that of shock. The reason, miles across from wear he was standing was a door. A door bigger then the empire state building!

"W-what is.....NO this must be a mistake not that I'm one to make mistakes. The data was exactly the same, why would I SHRINK!", Will clenched his head as not only was he panicking about his shrinking but also that he, the smart and handsome scientist made a mistake.

The existential crisis was halted as a strange vibration started swaying Will. He was confused, these patterns weren't like a earthquake, they were like that of....footsteps.

Suddenly the gigantic door opened like that of a ominous portal. Stepping into the room was a young boy around the age of 13 or 14. He was wearing a white dress shirt with a black vest, black shorts and long dark socks with brown dress shoes. The giant boy had short blond hair and a frown on his face as he pulled off his gloves.

"I swear...these basterds must have had a swing of scotch if that was their so-called job proposition.", the giant scoffed as he started walking towards Will.

Will felt the ground shake more as the shoe's soles stomped the ground. The boy's blue eyes suddenly narrowed at the tiny speck a few feet away.

"Bloody hell, summer just arrived and bugs are already plaguing my office!", The giant boy started stomping closer, throwing Will into the carpet from the force of his stomps.

Will gasped as looking up, the giant looked at him in disgust and lifted his large foot over the tiny scientist.

"Stay where you are pest! It will only take a second to crush you.", the boy's disgusted look was blocked as he started stomping his dress shoe down.

The scientist snapped out of his stare before scrambling away as the giant stopped his previous spot. As the foot swiveled, the giant noticed the lack a crunch.

Looking to see Will fleeing, the boy growled and lifted his foot again. "I'm going to grind you to dust!"

Will looked up to the approaching sole before yelling.

"WAIT I'M NOT A BUG!"
1521.title: Victorian Era!....Is Much Bigger

choices: Oliver Torments Will With His Smelly Feet!
15211.content:
The sky filling shoe sole stopped in midair, there was a long period of silence before the boy moved his foot out of the way to look down at Will with a raised eyebrow.

"I must be hearing things..." The boy sighed as he prepared to stomp down on Will yet again.

"N-no you're not! I'm NOT a bug! I'm a person!" Will screamed up at the youth. The boy's eyes widened and locked once more on to Will.

It happened so fast that William's mind could barely process it, the mountainous boy got down on his hands and knees...like an avalanche occurring.

The boy squinted at Will before bringing up a colossal finger and prodding at the 'bug'. "Ouch!" Will yelped. The boy's eyes widened once more before he narrowed them.

"Alright, you're obviously capable of speaking...somehow. But if you ARE a person then I demand to know WHY you are in MY office!" The boy demanded authoritatively.

William blurted it all out at once, somehow making it sound a lot LESS crazy than he thought it would. However, the boy's reaction was surprising.

"So you're telling me you are from the future...? And your meddling in things beyond your control caused you to shrink and end up in MY office of all places." The boy had a rather accusatory tone.

"Y-yes...I know it sounds insane-" William started to say.

"It sounds so insane I should call the local lunatic asylum and see if they have room for you! Heh, what am I saying...someone like you couldn't possibly need much room." The boy chuckled and roughly prodded Will with his gargantuan finger.

"Oofgh!" Will yelped as he hit the carpet on his rear.

"However, you say you can build one of these machines?" The boy inquired, getting an idea.

"W-well I-" Will started to say, but was interrupted once more. "You see I am the head of the Neale Oil Company, I've done quite well for myself..."

"B-but you're...a kid...." Will said, making a shrill squeak as he saw the fiery glare that the boy suddenly shot him.

"What was that?!" The boy bellowed.

"N-nothing!" Will squeaked.

"As I was saying...I have recently started searching for a way to branch out into other areas. So far I've received nothing but moronic business offers and pitiful commoners asking for loans. However, I believe you can be of use to me in that regard." The boy grinned deviously.

"W-what? But I have to get home!" Will shouted.

"Hmph, why should I care about YOUR needs? You are an insect, below even the most wretched serf! As far as I'm concerned I am doing you a great service by not smashing your pitiful existence under my heel!" The boy sneered cruelly.

"You will build this machine for me...HERE. You will make sure it works PERFECTLY, and we shall reveal it to the world and I shall lay claim to the greatest achievement in business history!" The boy bellowed in a haughty voice.

Will was at a loss for words. Not only would he most likely NEVER get home due to his arrogant self destruct mechanism counting down. But he would have to scrape and dig for some way to build it in a vastly less developed time period!

"N-No! I can't do that! I HAVE to get home!" Will shouted his refusal with a stomp of his puny foot.

Bad move!

The youth snatched him up in an instant and stood back up with the puny man in his fist. "Refusing me? I never was one to take the word 'no' very well." Stomping around to his desk, William saw the nameplate read: 'Mr. Oliver'.

"H-hey, is that your name..? Oliver?" Will tried to smooth talk the giant boy, hoping he hadn't just screwed himself. But Oliver squeezed him hard in his fist. "Quiet. That may be my name, but only humans get to refer to me like that. You shall refer to me as..." Oliver dumped Will onto the desk's surface and flopped himself down in his comfortable chair.

"Master." Oliver grinned demonically and two 'clunk' sounds were heard beneath the desk. Oliver grunted in satisfaction before bringing his glued on stocking-clad feet up onto the desk.

He quickly began peeling them off.
15211.title: Not Crushed, But...

152113.content:
Will looked up in shock as two large shadows casted over him. The plump soles were as tall as a house to him. Suddenly, Will found himself choking as a sudden strong odor hit him.

Oliver crossed his arms as he smirked at the speck between his large feet. The coughing amused him as he wiggled his large toes.

"Hmm you seem out of sorts, oh I see are my feet too smelly for you? I've been rushing between meetings and my socks tend to heat up a tad?"

The blue eyes grew malicious as he suddenly brought his sweaty sole down. Will yelped as he suddenly was pinned to the desk, the plump sole had put heavy weight and started to shove a strong stench down his nose.

Oliver's plump sole had a funky cheese odor with a vinegary tinge in the swear coating them. The young boy chuckled as he added a bit of pressure to squash Will.

"Allowing me to introduce my lads to you. Think of them as your superiors, as they'll be putting you beneath them. Now....why not give your superiors a kiss?"

The blond giant lifted his foot that it hung over Will, ready to stomp at any second. The tiny scientist looked in horror as the plump sole hung above and bathed him in its chessy stench.

"N-no way I'm not kissing you nasty foot!"

Oliver frowned and stomped his foot down again, this time he began pressing down harder. Will found himself sinking into the soft and grimy sole, becoming more heated as the chessy sole consumed him.

"Insect, I don't appreciate back talk. Your lucky I have use for you as such backtalk would guarantee a spot beneath my shoe."

Oliver spat the words with venom in his voice as he lifted his sole, Will was now stuck like gum as he had a mold in the plump sole.

"I'll repeat myself, kiss my sole NOW.", Oliver's voice carried a true voice of authority as he looked at Will like a chef to horrible cooking.

With no other choice Will pressed his lips to the sole and kissed the squishy sole. The grimy sweat and chessy funk attacked his taste buds, but he dare not gag.

Oliver hummed and nodded his head. "So you aren't stupid. Let this be a learning experience pest, while your under me I expect you to treat my feet as your rulers. Now....what is my name?"

Will grunted as he pulled his head from the mold. "...Master."

The giant smirked as flexed his sole while using his other foot to peel him out of his chessy prison. Will yelped as he fell to the desk below. Oliver leaned his chin into his palm as he sneered at Will once again in his sole's shadow.

"Very good! I hope you keep this talk in mind insect. Because expect to be under my lads a good amount. You were much more satisfying to squash then a ordinary bug. Still your tongue will guarantee a punishment for you~"

Will looked in fear as Oliver shifted, his punishment was....
152113.title: The Cheesy Superiors

choices: Will's Hands Work Their Way Upward
Someone Knocks on the Office Door!
1521132.content:
Oliver thumped his heels down, displaying both thick soles to Will in all their cheesy-vinegar glory. Oliver still was resting his chin in his palm as he grinned. "As punishment for your backtalk to someone far above you, you will be giving my lads a good rubdown."

Will gulped, that stench was ever present, but the brat was in the position of power here. As much as it hurt his pride and disgusted him, he had to do what this gargantuan power-mad boy said. As Will picked himself up off the desk and trudged toward the big feet, Oliver continued to mock him.

"My my, you're not as dumb as I thought! You seem to finally have accepted that I am indeed your master. Now, hurry up! I haven't got all day to wait on worms!" Oliver haughtily boomed.

Will grit his teeth as he finally arrived at the mushy soles, it took everything he had not to shout out some retort to the kid's attitude. The funky smell was as potent and strong as it had been when he was mushed into the sole. Holding up his trembling hands, every instinct telling him to refuse, he pushed his hands into the pillowy and moist wall.

"Mmmh~." Oliver made pleased humming sounds as he sat back in his chair. At least he could feel Will's hands, that would be troublesome if he couldn't even feel the insect's massaging.

Still, Oliver wanted to break this little bug. Oliver didn't get where he was by being afraid to trample on others and destroy them...whether financially or otherwise.

Oliver chortled a bit, now he had someone he could LITERALLY trample upon. Fanning his toes back and forth, Oliver delighted in the coughing sounds that came from in front of his feet. It gave him a rush to know that his mere foot odor was so powerful to someone who was so small.

"Be sure you savor every breath of that smell, bug. If it weren't for my...benevolence...you would've been a stain on my shoe." Oliver boomed. "So you should be grateful to still be breathing at all." Oliver licked his lips.
1521132.title: Victorian Era Footrub!

choices: He orders Will to pamper his toe gaps!
15211321.content:
Will desperately tried to fight the dread filling him to no avail. Oliver had the power that a god has over a mortal, the ability to snuff them out if they wish.

"Insect. You've pampered my heel enough, start rubbing the rest.", Oliver ordered without missing a beat.

The tiny scientist internally sighed before using the rough heel as a stepping stone of sorts. As Will sank his hands into the middle of the plump sole, sweat squelched out and released bursts of chessy odor.

Oliver hummed as the tiny had rubbed his tired soles, he had walked so much between meeting and felt his feet grow sore. Thankfully his pet bug was doing good in releasing tension build up as well as his feet's build up odor.

Will forced down a cough as he inhaled the think stench, clouding his nose with the cheddary funk. He thought of his situation, Oliver had complete control over him, he would squash him as he pleased and order him around like a servant. If he wasn't going to end up as a splat mark he would have to be in Oliver's good graces.

"O-Master?", Will quickly said as he corrected himself.

Oliver opened one blue eye and grunted in reply. Will clutched the plump sole as he climbed higher.

"Well...um how did you come to own such a impressive buisness!", Will tried to flatter.

The giant smirked and chuckled as he crossed his arms. "So my ant want's to know of my buisness endeavors? I'll tell you then. My father was a wild man, he drank his life away and flirted with anything that was beautiful. One such person was my mother, after she birthed me my father was forced to take responsibility and raise me after her death."

"So...learned business from your father?", Will said before yelping as the sole flexed.

Oliver tched as he shook up his bug. "That basterd hardly taught me to read. His Oil company wasn't at the height it is now, he gave me 50% of the industry as a joke. Little did he knew it would be his downfall. I soon grew my portion, many of his workers respected me more because a had a clue on how to work everything. The miserable fool drank himself to death as he found his offspring rising above him."

The tiny soon reached the ball of the sole, the squishy flesh was deeper and the chessy funk was stronger. Will thought about Oliver's story, even from a smaller age he was ruthless.

The giant grinned impishly as he wiggled his toes and subjected Will to more of the gunky odor.

"I then expanded my company, multiple dimwits approached me with offers. I however crushed them and their proposals beneath me. They are moronic in believing they are as high in society with me, their just dirt to stick to my shoe."

Oliver chuckled as he stretched his toes wide open. Will was assaulted at full force by the gunk between Oliver's toes. Sweaty chesse jam and lint littered his toe gaps as steam poured out.

"Oh my, quite the day if my toes are that full. I trust this isn't a problem right insect?"

Will forced his cough down and shook his head as he climbed onto the chessy ledge.

Oliver smirked as....
15211321.title: Climbing And A Tale

choices: Will is Put to Work...Perhaps on a Shrinking Device for Oliver to Use?
152113211.content:
"Good, because I fully expect you to clear them out for me." Oliver pompously demanded of the tiny Will..who by now was up at the toe gaps themselves. Oliver leaned back in his chair and cracked an eye open, it gleamed with a sinister mirth.

"By tongue I mean..." Oliver chuckled darkly. Will could scarcely believe his ears, this filthy jam was already assaulting his nose...now he had to add TASTE on to the list?! Oliver seemed to sense his incredulousness because he narrowed that open eye.

"Unless of course, you'd rather I smear you instead?"

That got the message across loud and clear to Will. Hesitant as he was, he didn't want to die..and he had no doubt this cruel businessman brat wouldn't think twice about snuffing him out!

So with much reluctance, Will leaned down and gave the grimy crevice a lick.

He felt the bile in his stomach rise as a big glob of the grime assaulted his taste buds. It was bitter and sour, but he forced himself to swallow it...as much as it burned like acid down his throat.

Oliver chuckled as he relaxed back, enjoying the feeling of superiority over the miniscule future-man.

"Things are certainly going to be less hum-drum around here. I have plans for you, tiny one..." Oliver said ominously.

Time soon passed and Will's stomach felt full to bursting with nothing but the Victorian brat's toe jam. Upon inspecting his toes Oliver nodded. "You did well...for a starting effort. I shall expect you will improve as I certainly shall have you doing this sort of thing regularly."

Will could only groan at the thought of this being a regular occurrence.

"Now..." Oliver put his shoes and still damp stockings back on. "Seeing as you work for me now, I shall need a necessary starting point to gauge your skills...other than being a groveling wretch who eats my toe filth." Oliver smirked.
152113211.title: Toe Gaps and Discussing Plans

1521132111.content:
Oliver leaned his head into his palm, tapping the table with his other hand. The giant snorted in amusement as Will was knocked down from his simple tapping.

"Now that your under my power I have a task for someone like you. Your a scientist you said?", Oliver raised an eyebrow and getting a quick nod out of Will.

"Good then if you managed to come here from the future then you'll have no problem creating a mechanism that can put my foes...in your shoes."

Will gulped. "Y-you mean.."

Oliver smirked. "Yes, insect I order you to create a device to shrink others down to your size. Better yet, maybe even smaller. I crushed other's ambitions numerous times, but I believe I could reinforce that by putting them beneath me in their place!"

Will sweated, while a shrinking ray was possible it was giving it to Oliver that scared him. The giant brat being able to downsize others could lead to countless red splats. But still, either Will does this or Oliver's sole will be his final sight.

"...Understood master."

Oliver smugly grinned as he pulled out a paper and writing utensil, putting them in front of Will. "Excellent, start working. I'm already eager to have the basterds cowering in my shadow!"

The victorian boy smirked as Will struggled draw the designs. A good portion of money had strangely not gone through in the last buisness trade. The one responsible could expect a big surprise.
1521132111.title: Will's New Task

15211321111.content:
It was a fall evening in the big city of London, people were conducting their business rather it be simply shopping or full blown corporations. In one mansion a young boy was trying to deal with his business plans, quite a stressful activity but he had people beneath him to entertain the boy.

Oliver scrunched his eyebrows as he looked over the various papers, his dress shoes and socks sat besides his seat as both of his large feet were propped up on his desk.

If one looked closely at the boy's sweaty soles then they would find a small speck. This speck was known as Will, a scientist who once thought he could be on the top of the world with his time travel discovery. But now, he was an inch tall stuck in the past serving as the pet/servant of a Victorian brat. Oliver despite his young age, was not a merciful boy. Will had been given two choices, be the boy's servant or get crushed beneath the boy's fancy shoes.

"Bug why haven't you moved up! My heels have been pampered enough.", Oliver scoffed as he lifted up his foot and brought it down to shake up the desk and Will. "Hurry up or you'll spent an evening getting squished on my daily stroll!"

“Y-yes, of course!” Will squeaked as he scampered up to the center of the wide sole. The stink of cheesy vinegar got more potent the higher up he went. Will’s duties were not only to be Oliver’s foot masseuse, no, he had an extremely important and EXTREMELY difficult task when he wasn’t pampering the boy.

Given that Oliver was well aware he was from the future, Oliver was not only curious about what the future held...but about the tech that rendered Will so small.

Oliver acted like he was asking for a new toy to put others ‘beneath him’. Business rivals, embezzlers who were stealing money from the boy’s company..they all had a big target on them now.

Fortunately, Will’s genius allowed him to know full well a shrinking device was possible. UNfortunately...this time period didn’t exactly have an abundance of resources that his time had. You couldn’t just order parts or wires and fuses online here.

Will sighed, he had no other choice, the brat had expected the device to be done in record time, but some things were just not realistic. So, as he rubbed the mushy flesh of Oliver’s ball...he spoke up.

Oliver wouldn’t be TOO upset at him..asking for help with resources...would he?

“Um...master?” Will squeaked timidly.

A simply grunt as his answer as Oliver flipped through his papers. Will gulped before deciding now or never. "I wanted...to talk about the shrinking device."

"Ah yes, I trust you'll be ready to construct it soon?", Oliver hummed as his eyes scanned his paper, feeling the tiny hands push into his plump sole.

Will would take a deep breath had it not been for the potent fumes in front of him. "I can built it yes! But i just needed to ask if i...could have help getting the parts?"

Thankfully rather than an angry shout, Oliver chuckled as he wiggled his toes. "Insect i can purchase whatever necessary and have it here by dusk. Just tell me what's needed."

"Ok so far so good, all I need now is to convince him to let me have some extra time!", Will felt giddy as this was going well.

"S-sounds great i should have it done by next week no problem!"

Oliver narrowed his eyes, suddenly Will yelped as the foot arched forward. The next thing the scientist knew he was being squished against the desk by Oliver's cheesy soft feet.

"I said i can get you whatever necessary, that doesn't mean I'm going to let you slack off. I said I wanted this device by friday and i intend to have it by then. Let this be a lesson insect, don't push your luck with your master!", Oliver scoffed as he pressed his large foot onto Will, making sure to squash him into the ball of his foot.

Lifting up his foot so it loomed over again, Oliver smirked. "Now get back to pampering my feet!"

Will coughed from the sudden decompression of his lungs, as well as having been forced to inhale the rancid smell of this giant boy’s foot. Oliver enjoyed hearing those pitiful hacks and wheezes as Will recovered from his stomp. As well as knowing his foot odor had a part to play in your little ‘breathing issue’.

“I’m waitiiing~!” Oliver mockingly sang, flexing his bulbous toes up above him and on his other foot.

“Y-yes...of course, master…” Will whimpered as he climbed up to where Oliver’s ball and toes met. The tiny’s nose tingled, as usual when he were dealing with these well formed toes.

In an effort to appease the giant, he planted a small kiss on the pad of Oliver’s gargantuan big toe. Oliver chuckled and licked his lips, “You’re too kind, but it will take more than a mere kiss to make me think of you as anything other than a bug.” The gigantic youth leaned forward, setting his papers down for the moment.

The shadow of the colossal lad fell over Will and he looked up to see his enormous face grinning down sinisterly.
“You’re a USEFUL bug, but still a bug.” Oliver boomed down with a snicker.

Will shivered as the giant brat loomed over, he once again kissed the toe bigger then half his body. He licked just to hopefully appease Oliver more, cringing as he tasted the vinegary sweat coating the toes.

Oliver placed his chin in his palm chuckling at his tiny servant's worship. "Yes that's right, give my feet the care they deserve. It seems your are SLIGHTLY above a bug, but only because the insects I find aren't intelligent enough to try and please me. But still, i can break you just like the bugs that cross me."

Fear hit Will at the cruel yet childish voice degrading him. Oliver was keeping him alive only because he amused the brat and could benefit him with his knowledge.
15211321111.title: Continue 1

152113211111.content:
"Aw what's wrong, am i scaring the bug? Afraid I'll crush you and grind you to dust beneath my heel?", Oliver smirked as he licked his lips. "Don't worry, keep kissing my feet like the other basterds beneath me and i won't have your final sight be my shoe's sole."

Oliver suddenly spread his toes, wiggling them and hitting Will with an even stronger cheese odor. The toe gaps of the giant had a melted gunky lint smeared in the center and walls. The brat reached down surprisingly gently patted Will's head, however this was yet another mocking manner.

"Why not clean out my toes for me little bug? Since you seem much more enthusiastic about serving my feet today.", Oliver chuckled evilly as he leaned back into his seat, crossing his arms as he peered in between his toes at the tiny Will.

Will suppressed the urge to vomit at the sight and intense stink that festered before him. Will knew if he threw up Oliver might stomp him again...much harder this time.

Will knew full well that by 'cleaning' Oliver meant licking up that jam. So with a heavy heart, Oliver steadied himself and leaned in to the first crevice.

Oliver narrowed his eyes and wore a conceited smirk as Will took his first major lick. A big glop of gunk was pulled into his mouth and Will's stomach lurched.

Oliver noticed the runt struggling and gleefully decided to make it worse.

"Swallow." Oliver commanded, putting Will on the spot.

Will's eyes bulged as the revolting gunk sat in his mouth, he could feel the cruel eyes of Oliver locked on him. Forcing down his gag, Will swallowed the gunk feeling it burn both his mouth and throat.

Oliver laughed as his servant down the gunk, trying to hide his disgust. "Ah i hope you enjoyed it, your so use to the fumes of my cheese i figured it be fair only to have some of it raw! Now then, hopefully your not full because I have so much more for you."

The tiny gagged as he still tasted the gunk, bending down Will tried to cheat his way out of eating another clump by kissing the chessy gunk. However, Oliver coughed getting his attention and looking up Will saw the brat with a raised eyebrow and sneering.

"While kissing my feet is kind of you bug I specifically told you to eat my noble gunk. Need i crush another lesson into you?"

Frantically shaking his head, Will climbed into the toe gap and once again ran his tongue across the warm crevice to lick up more gunk. Oliver chuckled as he watched the bug feast upon the gunk. Flexing his toes, Oliver fanned out the smell of his odorous toes to ensnare Will in his chessy power.

After several minutes and several mouthfuls of toejam there came a knock at Oliver’s office door. “Come in.” Oliver called simply, his attention still on Will.

In came the Colewood manor butler, a tall lanky older gentleman in the traditional butler’s uniform. The butler tried to hide the distaste that might’ve shown on his face upon witnessing the scene.

It might’ve came as a surprise for anyone else, but Oliver’s ‘bug’ had been shown to the house staff so they would be careful not to squash him. Also so they could keep tabs on him to make sure Will wasn’t ‘slacking off’ as Oliver put it.

Still, one never got used to that smell or seeing such a vulgar display as a tiny eating a giant boy’s toejam.

“Master Colewood, I have reviewed the records and I believe I have tracked down the person responsible for the missing funds.” Higguns the butler drawled as he approached the desk and handed Oliver a document.

Oliver nodded and eagerly took it, casually flexing his toes in excitement...knowing once this bug finished the device...he’d have a second bug to torment...for awhile at least.
“That will be all, Higguns.” Oliver waved the butler away, causing the servant to bow and depart, closing the door behind him.

Will was suddenly jolted as Oliver lifted the foot he was on top of. The foot was crossed over the other one casually, causing Will to have to grip the side of Oliver’s pinky toe to prevent falling.

William wondered if his master had forgotten he was in here. Oliver however, opened the document and scowled. “As if I didn’t already know who it was. Now I just have evidence.” Oliver gained a practically demonic smile as he looked back up at his toes.

“Alright, I suppose you may stop now.” Oliver reached forward and plucked Will out of the final crevice on the right foot.

“I have to save some of my cheese for my soon to be victim, don’t I?” Oliver said darkly as he dangled Will before his eyes.

“Y-yes, of course master.” Will chirped.

Oliver pulled his feet off the desk and thumped them down onto the carpeted floor.

“You should provide me with a list of the resources you require so I may order them and have them shipped here.” Oliver boomed as he deposited Will on the desk’s surface which smelled of feet now.

“And remember...you have until Friday. Today is Monday, I believe you have more than enough time. Tch, the gall of you! Asking for extra time…” Oliver scoffed.

Before Will could attempt and let out a pathetic reply, he was knocked down to the desk as Oliver slammed a paper and pen. "Start writing, i want to send this out before the hour's over."
152113211111.title: Continue I

1521132111111.content:
Oliver smirked as Will began struggling to write with the writing utensil bigger then him. Reaching down, the brat picked up his damp socks in his shoes. Since he's had Will, Oliver began to reuse his socks as he wanted to let his feet back in the most potent of scents. What's having a tiny servent if you can't give them the full potential of foot smells?

Pulling the socks over his feet, Oliver sighed as the damp fabric stretched over his large feet. Wiggling his plump toes in the socks Oliver then slipped on his dress shoes and tapped them to feel the damp fabric let out squelches from his sweaty feet.

Will panted as he's arms got sore from having to use the giant pen, but alas he soon wrote down the essential parts needed to construct the shrink ray.

"M-master this is all!", Will said dropping the pen and letting his burning arms hanging.

Oliver picked up the paper, after briefly scanning over it he hummed and folded it in half. "Indeed, I'll send for these to be delivered at once. Consider this your break bug, I expect this to be finished by Friday so I won't have you be distracted by pampering me.", the boy sneered as he headed for the door. "Once I have the device in my hands, I will crush more than that fool's dreams!"

As he walked off to hand the list to a servant, Oliver took another look at the paper Higguns gave him. On the paper detailed the reports of one of Oliver's brokers, while he was supposed to only be buying certain goods there was more money taken out then needed for the purchase. Of course the blond boy could just kick the man to the streets.

But he already had it planned out, not only would he shrink the worm in his company. He would set an example to everyone else on what happens to those who cross him.

The Colewood manor began to bustle with activity for the next few days. Not only were the servants working to prepare the house for a board meeting of Oliver's company workers, but Will was using every bit of his high I.Q to build the shrinking device. Spending every hour awake constructing the ray gun.

Oliver did show some care for Will, demanding that he go to sleep at a curfew. The lord spent his evenings watching with curiosity as Will built the machine, all while longing for a foot rub.

Throughout all the days that Will worked on the device, Oliver refused to bathe and only took his shoes off to go to bed. As for his socks, he still didn’t change them, but he certainly didn’t peel them off his worsening feet in all this time.

On Thursday at noon, Oliver was dozing off at his desk when a bright lime green light startled him. The light stopped and where Will had been standing on the carpet doing his work, there now stood a young adult male. The man was holding what appeared to be a toy ‘ray gun’ you’d find at a cheap store.

Oliver blinked as the man said with a voice that was Will’s only...far less squeaky. “Well, that worked.” Will shrugged.

Oliver frowned, “First of all...so that’s what you look like at normal size. Second, what do you think you’re doing?”

Will paled and appeared rather nervous, “Oh um...I’m sorry master...I had to test it on something organic and y’know. I wasn’t going to test it on you out of courtesy...and I didn’t want to make you mad...but also didn’t want to risk it not working at the last moment...” Will trailed off sheepishly.

Even at normal size, Will knew who was boss obviously.

Oliver smugly smiled, holding out his hand. "I understand now why not show me how this works so that we can put you back in your place."

Will nodded and set the ray gun in Oliver's palm. Even if he was grown again, the scientist was still trapped in the past and surrounded by multiple servants that would surely keep him here.

"The green button grows organic creatures, the blue one shrinks them down. If their held down for more than a sec then they'll continue to grow or shrink their target."

The boy hummed before pointing the device at Will, pressing the blue button a flash of light surrounded the older man. As he began to dwindle down in size, Will climbed onto Oliver's desk and after a few seconds he was back to his inch tall form

Oliver chuckled as he looked from the ray gun to Will. "Excellent work bug! Now I can put any of the insufferable bastards beneath me, show them their place."

Will nervously smiled and nodded. He was shaken up by the fact that he gave a merciless boy a size ray, but it was this or being crushed. Oliver smirked as he suddenly pulled out a pocketwatch.

"Just in time as well, the meeting is in half an hour. Soon I'll have two ants pampering my feet soon, though I intend to not let the new one prove it's usefulness like you."
1521132111111.title: Continue I

15211321111111.content:
Oliver put down the ray gun and bend over, pulling his foot out of a shoe Oliver grunted as his damp stocking popped out. Lifting up his shoe, the boy took a sniff out of the warm insole. Oliver licked his lips as he reached down and plucked up Will.

"It seems my cheese has baked quite nicely. Only fitting i welcome your new bug friend with the ripest of scents.", Oliver smirked as he suddenly dangled Will over the opening to his shoe.

Will felt green in the face as the odorous fumes blasted him, the cheddary musk was 3x as strong now with the unbathed feet. Oliver chuckled above him. "You will be attending the meeting with me, and I wouldn't want you to stay cold!"

Letting go of the tiny, Will was dropped into the shoe soon landing and making a splash of sweat from the wet insole. The cave of the shoe was filled with the potent odor of vinegary cheese and made Will feel close to vomiting.

Oliver's booming chuckles echoed in the shoe and signaled a terrifying sight. The socked toes began to enter the shoe, Will tried to crawl away but found the toes pushing him face first into the sweaty insole. Soon Oliver pushed his foot all the way in, pulling Will under him to where he was getting squished into the ball of the brat's sole.

Oliver sighed and enjoyed the feeling of the bug under him. The wealthy brat knew this would be the first of many insignificant worms he’d be walking all over.

The young oil tycoon made his way confidently to the meeting room. He was of course the youngest businessman in recorded history, and he knew that irked some of his business rivals AND employees to no end. This brought him great joy to get under their skin and make them feel inferior...as they should.

But with his newly acquired power, they’d be more insignificant to him than they could ever have dreamed. The brat entered the meeting room, a snack table was at the side of the room along with refreshments and all that.

At the center of the room was a long table of glossy wood, along all sides of the table were chairs.

But at the head of the table was the comfiest and most plush one reserved for the boss: Oliver.

The boy strode into the room with an air of confidence only someone who was completely in charge could emit. But confidence wasn’t the only thing he was emitting...after days of not bathing.


The heads of each division of the many branches of Colewood Industries were all here. As Oliver scanned the ‘guests’ he saw the broker: Karl Ashford.

Oliver had looked into him recently, looking for weaknesses he could exploit and perhaps family he could cruelly use against him. Indeed, Ashford apparently had a wife and son who JUST so CONVENIENTLY...bought a nice home for the three of them.

Oliver had made plans for them as well...to break his prey’s spirit even more.

The young lad felt Will squirm underfoot and smirked, feeling his stocking squelch out sweaty moisture as he took his seat at the head of the table.

“Everyone is here? Good.” Oliver said as he looked over the crowded table. “I suspect you all know why you’re here? ….The snake in our garden.” Oliver said, his eyes lingering on Ashford for a few seconds but no noticeably longer than anyone else.

“What do you mean, sir?” One of the department heads spoke up.

Oliver sighed, “I mean...one of you has been embezzling funds.”
The room went into an uproar of gasps and attempts to shift blame...that is before Oliver slammed his palm down on the table to silence everyone.

Oliver noticed Ashford was starting to look nervous and sweat.

The boy licked his lips, “The bastard hasn’t experienced true heat...pressure..or sweat. He will…”

“Rest assured I already have found out which one of you it is.” Oliver pushed his chair back and stood up...beginning to circle the table like some sort of humanoid shark.

Slowly he walked behind each of therm and continued to talk. “Spending company money, meant to be utilized for company affair..MY money. So I am seeing fit to deal with them in a very harsh way.”

“Have you notified Scotland Yard?” One of the men at the table asked.

Oliver gave a dark chuckle, “Absolutely not. This is to be dealt with inside the company...by me...personally.”

Oliver felt himself swell with a feeling of absolute power as he saw Ashford was beginning to shake fearfully and whimper a bit. Oliver finally stopped behind Karl Ashford and pulled out the gun.

“Is that a gun?!” One of the employees shrieked as everyone rose from their seats slightly.

Karl turned around and saw the cruel, yet amused look, Oliver was giving him.

“You tried...that’s the important thing...right?” Oliver asked mockingly...and held down the blue button. Everyone yelped and backed away as the blue light enveloped Ashford...until he was a mere 1cm tall and fell into Oliver’s palm.

The room was in shock, wandering wherein the world Ashford suddenly vanished to only to find Oliver sneering down at a speck in his Hand.

As Oliver strolled around the table, murmurs began to encircle the room all confused on what just transpired. Everyone went silent as Oliver sat down and held the speck before his cruel eyes.

"Ah look at that, a true leech. Sucking the blood out of my company, though in this case you thought i wouldn't notice my funds being used properly. Honestly even the post pettiest of thieves are smart enough not to try such an idiotic tactic!'

"Lord Colewood...is that speck..?"

Chuckling and closing his eyes, Oliver put Ashford in his vest pocket. The boy smirked as he looked up at the men and began to step on his heels to pull his feet off. "Ah so you figured it out. Well I'll confirm that hunch, yes the pathetic gnat was Mr.Ashford."

The room soon became filled with uproars of shocked voices, some wondering how it's possible with others trying to deny something like that is impossible. Oliver smugly grinned as the men all yelled like chickens, he soon began to pull off his socks for another display.

Everyone's attention was drawn as Oliver suddenly thumped the table again, however rather then smacking with his palm, Oliver planted both of his large and sweaty bare feet up on the table. Aside from the smell being attention grabbing, the sight of another small speck confirmed that indeed Oliver had the capabilities of changing someone's size.

Leaning forward, Oliver put the panting Will in front of his heel. The Victorian brat crossed his arms and smirked. Spreading his feet to look directly at Will, Oliver spoke in an authoritative voice.

"Rub."

Despite being soaked in sweat and still heated up from getting squashed by Oliver's rank foor, Will quickly got up and rushed to the heel and began to rub. Oliver looked up at the table, seeing men looking at his feet in awe or fear.

"This bug here is known as Will, however addressing him as bug is important as it's one way to remind him of his place. I make him give me foot service and he is the one who built this amazing contraption."

Oliver suddenly brought his foot down, reminiscent of a few days ago. The blond boy smirked as the men gasped. "Of course I have ways of dealing with bugs. I've spent my career crushing those who tried to cheat me of my business. Now with this i can ensure none of the leeches go uncrushed."

Bringing up the gun, Oliver licked his lips as he twirled the device. "You get my point gentlemen, it would be a shame if i had to use this on my more reliable members"

The room once again became filled with voices, this time agreement with Oliver's point.

Oliver smirked, the commotion died down as he raised his hand. “Good. You will speak nothing of this meeting and what you have heard here. If anyone inquires upon the..disappearance of Mr. Ashford...you will claim you have no idea where he could be. Am I clear, gentlemen?” Oliver gave the gun another twirl, and everyone chorused: “Of course, sir!”
Oliver chuckled, “Very good, this meeting is over then. You can find your own way out.” The lad leaned back in his chair as he flexed his bulbous toes with a squelch.

The businessmen hurried out of the meeting, some casting looks back at the horrendous soles and feeling pity for poor Karl Ashford.
15211321111111.title: Continue I

152113211111111.content:
Oliver smirked deviously as he reached into his vest pocket and pulled out the balling wretch that was Mr. Ashford. Dangling him before his cold eyes, Oliver licked his lips as he took in the man’s sorry state.

The poor thing was hysterical, wailing and sobbing in a squeaky voice much like a bug that needed a good squish!

“Oh do pull yourself together, be a man...well...you aren’t really a man anymore now are you?” Oliver’s voice boomed mockingly.

“I-I’m sorry! I’m so sorry! Please-!” The puny man was pleading pitifully. Will tried to tune it out, he couldn’t let any pity for the poor man cloud his judgement.

Besides, the man had done this to himself pretty much.

Oliver scoffed, “Begging already? You truly are a miserable little parasite.” The colossal lad narrowed his eyes menacingly.

The man wailed, he was still pretty much in a hysterical state.

“You thought you could outsmart me..steal from me...you truly are a miserable leech on my company.” Oliver sneered. “You can stop squeaking at me, I care not for the wails of sub-human scum who I could very well crush with even my smallest toe.” Oliver’s verbal lashes were only making the man feel even more horrible, and sob more.

Will was kneading Oliver’s arch when he heard his master’s booming last taunt.

“Well...might as well at least TRY to keep being useful.” Will thought before speaking up:

“Um..master...if he’s scum, then perhaps he should experience the filth you’ve been building up between your gargantuan toes these past days? No baths and whatnot…” Will suggested.

Oliver hummed lightly squishing Will to the table before raising his foot all the way up. "Ah yes, i have built up quite an amount. Only fair i give the insect his welcoming present."

Placing Ashford on top of his finger, Oliver smirked as he opened and wiggled his toes. He could feel the gunk getting mashed up and more melted, the bug began to wail louder and more panicked as he saw where Oliver was beginning to bring the finger holding him.

Ashford was soon thrown off of the massive finger and yelled as he was launched through the air. The thick stench filling the air began to thicken and the fall was soon cushioned as the cm tall man fell into the hot cheese gunk. Looking up, Ashford saw the giant face of Oliver looking down.

Licking his lips and scoffing, Oliver began to close his toes. "Pathetic."

Oliver smirked as he barely felt the tiny body between his plump toes, feeling more flooded with the gunk flooding around Ashford and subjecting him to a cheesy doom.

"I must say your not even a leech. Goodness sake your not even a gnat, your just worthless. Drowning you in my foot filth is only the start i will slowly break you until you beg for death. I will relish when i eventually crush you into paste, smearing you under my shoe like flattened ants."

Will who was climbing and rubbing suddenly was snatched up in a fist and brought before Oliver's smug face. The blond licked his lips as he looked back and forth from Will to his wiggling toes.

"This bug is at least useful and can give me the most excellent contraptions. You on the other hand are only meant to be my entertainment, and receive the fate of all bugs i find invading my office!"

The 1cm man was struggling like he was lost at sea...and in a way he was. It was not a sea of saltwater however, but a sea of built up sludge between a bratty young businessman’s toes! Ashford at least took some comfort in the knowledge that his family was secure in their financial future...thanks to the money he took for them.

Will couldn’t help but blush as he heard how he was ‘useful’ to his master. It was similar to a less severe form of stockholm syndrome Will reckoned. Like those who fell in love with their kidnappers, Will felt a strange sense of loyalty to Oliver now. The boy could’ve crushed him underfoot but he didn’t, in fact he allowed him to serve him with his talents.

Will reasoned that it was more out of fear of the boy than anything else..but he wasn’t so sure of anything anymore after his colossal failure landed him in this time period.

As if Oliver was reading Ashford’s thoughts, the young lad smirked confidently and decided to take that ‘comfort’ away from the pest. By the time Ashford had arrived at the meeting, his family was already being booted out of their lovely home accrued by HIS money.

"You know above all else the reason you acted like a parasite to my wealth is due to your family right?", Ashford froze in shock as the booming cruel voice boomed down.

"While some may consider it a noble act I consider it disrespectful to me, so as we speak my money is being secured back to me. Which of course means all of the luxuries you bought being foreclosed! What's more, since you're nowhere to be found the assumption will be that you abandoned your family not wanting to be caught for your crimes.", Oliver hummed as he taunted the pathetic creature being squashed in his filthy toes. He could picture it now, Ashford's wife and child growing hate for the puny man who seemingly abandoned them.

"Who knows my father was quite shit as well, maybe your brat will be like me when he grows?", Oliver smugly grinned as he rubbed his gunky toes together.

"H-he really is pathetic.", Will stuttered out from the fist.

Oliver rose an eyebrow amused. "Yes, you know you are worthless when another bug degrades you. Now let's not leave you without work shall we?"

The brat licked his lips as he set Will down in front of his other foot. All it took was a simple wiggle of Oliver's toes to sent him the order to start rubbing. The giant sighed as he felt the tiny hands start to rub his sweaty and chessy sole, all while he tortured Ashford in his gunk.

“I must say this device you created is already proving its usefulness.” Oliver mused as he enjoyed his foot rub.

“I’m glad you like it, master…” Will said from behind the huge foot. Oliver smirked at the reply, Will had figured out quickly how things worked around here.

“You know...I do believe you deserve a reward.” Oliver said casually. Will nearly stopped the rub he was so shocked!

“R-really, sir?” Will asked in disbelief. Oliver nodded and picked up the size ray, moving his foot out of the way for the moment. He hit the ‘grow’ button and increased Will’s size to that of a small figurine.

Will could hardly believe it, but remembered his manners and kneeled. “Thank you master!”

Oliver nodded, “This is for my benefit too, however.” Oliver gained a cruel smirk.

“Now your foot massages shall be better..and you can reach more of my noble feet without climbing.” Oliver flexed his toes in Will’s face, chuckling at the tiny’s wrinkling nose.

Oliver leaned forward and spread the toes on his other foot, revealing the miniscule parasite Ashford close to submerged in his jam. “I wouldn’t want this pest to drown in my toe slime already, now would I?” Oliver chuckled.

Pinching Ashford between two fingers, Oliver brought out a big wad of toe jam along with the 1cm man. He held the sticky glob to Will, “Smell it.”

Will obliged and felt his nostrils burn significantly less but still strongly as he leaned forward and inhaled the gunky fumes from the jam. Oliver smirked as he saw his tiny servent green in the face. "How is it dear insect?"


Gulping down any regurgitation, Will put on shaky smile. "It's very...strong master, much like you."

Oliver hummed as he brought the wad of gunk to his eyes. The blond boy narrowed his eyes as he spotted the micro Ashford in his toe jam. Licking his lips, Oliver brought the gunk back down to will.

"Here i think my bug should have a snack as well, just be careful to not consume the runt. Not that he be much of a snack." Oliver smirked dropping the gunk into Will's cupped palms.

The figurine sized man held back a sigh as he held the warm gunk in his hands, spotting Ashford pathetically squirming. Will might've already had a lunch of the foul gunk but he still wasn't used to it not to mention he had to be careful not to eat Ashford. Sliding the wad into his mouth, Will began to slowly break down the gunk and swallow the funky jam.

Little bits broke off from the wad and were swallowed down, burning Will's throat. After sucking on the jam for a good minute, Will felt the tiny body of Ashford sloshing around his mouth.
152113211111111.title: Continue I

15211321112.content:
The next day was quite pleasant, with the weather being up and Oliver's buisness endeavours for the day commenced.

The blond boy hummed as he looked over his paper, seeing the buisness inquiries of the past few days. He had his feet up on his desk though looking closely one could see under the heel of his shoe was the tiny scientist he recently came across.

Will groaned as the weight of the foot squished him and made him feel on the brink of getting crushed. He had made the mistake of requesting a certain amount of time for his construction of the shrinking device. That earned him the duty of footrest for the day.

Oliver smirked as he used the tiny human like a footrest. "I must say your not that amazing of a footrest insect. Had i not have you building that device I'd waste no time snuffing you out."

Will felt dread fill him at the cruel taunt, afraid any second he'd be a splat under the dress shoe of the Victorian boy. Still, with a chuckle Oliver rose his foot off of the tiny and leaned forward onto the desk.

"Now then, you'll finish the device before the end of the month correct? I'd hate to keep the scum of my company walking free.", Oliver asked narrowing his eyes.

"Y-yes master I'll have it in no time!", Will shouted standing up.

Oliver chuckled darkly. "Good that's what i want to hear. But, i still think i need to teach you in demanding time from your lord."

What did the giant do?
15211321112.title: A New Day For The Tiny Will

choices: Oliver Pulls the Shoe On and Goes to Dance Lesson!
152113211121.content:
Will gulped, he didn't like the sound of that. "M-Master, please...I never meant to-" Will started to plead, only to be cut off by Oliver slamming his palm on the desk. "Now now, you wouldn't happen to be back-talking me...would you?" Oliver's eyes glimmered with wickedness.

"No, my master!" Will squeaked, getting Oliver to grin smugly. "Good." Reaching forward, Oliver undid the strap on his dress shoe and popped it off with an outpouring of steam.

"Ahhh, how nice..." Oliver sighed as the shoe was pried off to reveal a sweaty, thin stocking covered foot.

William would never get used to this sight. The boy's feet dwarfed him in length AND width. It made him feel so insignificant whenever he saw them, no doubt that would've delighted the cruel boy.

The dress shoe was placed on the desk's surface, insides still emitting steam. Oliver leaned his face down, wearing a smugly satisfied grin as he gave the footwear a small sniff. "Mmm..I have worked up quite the cheese if I do say so myself." The posh boy boasted, before plucking Will up and dangling him over the opening.

"You will be my insole for the rest of the day. How unlucky for you I have a dance lesson today. Perhaps you could make it more bearable and...entertaining?" Oliver chuckled before releasing his tiny above the shoe.

Will tumbled down into the toe section, and the light was blocked by those wiggling, wet stocking toes that crept down towards him.
152113211121.title: Use Will as an insole

choices: Dancing lesson is over, Oliver decides to take a stroll
1521132111211.content:
Will watched in terror as the sweat ridden sock moved towards him, the cheesy air grew denser as the huge foot pushed in. The scientist couldn't even yell as the large toes pinned him to the insole with a splash of the sweat gathered from baking in the shoe.

The cheddary odor was shoved into Will's nostrils as the big toe alone smooshed him down. The toe gunk had melted from the heat and was emitting their killer fumes through the sock fabric.

Oliver smirked as he finally put his heel into his shoe. Wiggling his gunky toes, the blond boy felt them easily squash Will, filling his ego even more.

"I think my toes will teach my insect discipline.", Wiggling his toes once more, Oliver stood up and chuckled as he felt Will sink into his sweaty toes.

Will felt panicked as the pressure of the giant fuming toes suddenly increased, squirming pathetically against the odorous digits. Oliver sneered. "Oh you don't care for my toes? Well than why not try cushioning here!"

Bending his toes, Oliver tilted his foot up to sent Wil sliding down the sweaty insole. After moving a few inches, Oliver stomped his foot down now consuming Will in the plump flesh under the ball of his foot.

Oliver sighed as he walked and squashed the tiny under each step. "Ah much better. My noble feet are quite soft insect so you'll most likely not be crushed to an insignificant stain."

Beginning to walk out of his office, Oliver sneered down at his dress shoes. "I hope you learn your lesson from this, next time you back talk to your master I'll consider making my socks your bed!"

Will was no where better, sure the cheddary odor was a tiny bit less intense but now he was being consumed by the plump sole of Oliver. With each step he felt weightless before the sole squelched it's cheesy sweat and squished him.

Oliver strolled down the halls with a grin, different from his usual scowl or smirk. Passing butlers and maids made sure to show their respect, but they all picked up on the more instense steps he was taking.

Eventually Oliver reached a large ballroom, usually empty and only filled with activity when their were parties. Standing by the walls was an elderly lady using a cane to support herself.

"Ms.Anne I'm ready for my lesson.", Oliver said pressing down on his foot and sliding it.

The lady chuckled as she pushed up ger glasses. "My Oliver your more eager than usual! Now then, today we will be focusing on the waltz...."

Oliver nodded and kept a calm face as he began to move his body as instructed. The boy smirked internally as with each step he felt his sole stomp down on his tiny human. Truth be told his foot did feel more comfy with the puny man being squished into his sole.

Oliver wasn't always fond of dancing, but while simultaneously putting his bug beneath him. He grew an appreciation for the art.
1521132111211.title: A Dance Insole

154.content:
Somewhere sometime someplace on a furry world that's similar to our own the world's normal sized citizens happened to be going about their own business or day as they knew they would have a good or not so good day of course.

But what they didn't know of course was that a giant sized furry who happened to be one of the good guys was stomping towards their city as this particular furry was really obese and handsome as well.

At that time of day the ground started rumbling as the sound of giant sized footsteps could be heard as the citizens themselves stopped whatever it was they were doing as they took immediate notice of a giant really obese handsome furry that was stomping down their city streets as the giant really obese handsome furry was trying his best not wreck anything eat anything in sight or terrorize the citizens of this big city as the giant really obese handsome furry spoke.

"Have no fear everyone as I'm one of the good guys as I'm not gonna terrorize your city nor am I going to wreck anything except abandoned or condemned buildings as I'm not gonna eat everything in sight, but hold on a minute folks I hear the sound of a damsel in distress for this looks a job for yours truly." The unidentified giant really obese handsome furry said as he stomped on over to where the damsel in distress was at as everyone was watching.

At that moment the damsel in distress and the two thugs that almost mugged her looked up at the giant really obese handsome furry as he was there to save the day as he immediately confronted the two thugs themselves.

"Hold it right there you two for I'm not gonna let you mug this poor defenseless furry woman, now let the lady go or else!" The unidentified giant really obese handsome furry snarled.

"Or else what fat boy?" One of the two thugs asked as he insulted the star of this story.

"Yeah or else what you great big tub of lard?" The other thug asked as he too insulted the star of this story.

"Let me put this way I'll sit on you two and flatten you both like a pancake unless you let the lady go at once, now what's going to be?" The star of the story asked as he crossed his arms and looked rather menacingly at his adversaries.

"W-w-we'll let the lady go d-d-d-don't sit on us or hurt us!" The first thug said as he stammered and started begging for mercy.

"Y-y-y-yeah we'll let her go! and we'll turn ourselves over to the police at once!" The second thug said as he and his boss didn't want to be flattened like a pancake as they both turned themselves over to the authorities as both of them were handcuffed and put into a police car as they were hauled off to jail as the crowd cheered for their hero as the damsel in distress knew she was saved thanks to the star of this story.

"My hero but I didn't get your name, who are you?" The damsel in distress asked the star of this story.

"Ma'am and for all you normal folks of this big city allow me to introduce to myself as you're all about to get to know the real me." The star of this story said.

Now it's time to reveal the star of this story and original character as well.

Name: Ace Jones.
Height: giant sized.
Weight: really obese.
Alignment: super heroic good.
Species: dalmatian.
Age: 32.
